100.description: Default size, used for most components, i.e. checkboxes, tooltips, buttons

200.description: Large size, used for big surfaces and components, i.e. modals, cards, alerts

max.description: Large size, used for unique components, i.e. pills, avatars

100.description: Small shadow used for small components like checkboxes, buttons

200.description: Medium sized shadow for components like dropdowns, tooltips, toast notifications

300.description: Large shadow for components like modals, drawers

condensed100.description: Used for short body copy with no more than 4 lines within sections.

condensed200.description: Used for short body copy with no more than 4 lines within sections.

condensed300.description: Used for short body copy with no more than 4 lines within sections.

expressive100.description: Used for short body copy with no more than 4 lines within sections.

expressive200.description: Used for short body copy with no more than 4 lines within sections.

expressive300.description: Used for short body copy with no more than 4 lines within sections.

label100.description: Used for most components as the first and second level of information hirearchy.

label200.description: Used for most components as the first and second level of information hirearchy.

label300.description: commonly used for secondary levels of information within components.

helper.description: Used for Helper text, tooltips and inline validation for user input components.

badge.description: Used for Helper text, tooltips and inline validation for user input components.

display100.description: Used for large brand or marketing aligned messaging. Commonly found on landing pages and not used within B2B product.

display200.description: Used for extra large brand or marketing aligned messaging. Commonly found on landing pages and not used within B2B product.

title100.description: Used for subheadings typicaly no longer than one word.

title200.description: Used for small headings typicaly no longer than one word in tables and cards.

title300.description: Used for small headings typicaly no longer than one word in tables and cards.

title400.description: Used for small headings and subsection headings. commonly found in modals.

title500.description: Used for medium to small layout or section titles.

title600.description: Used for large layout and page titles with no more than 3-4 words or where a line break does not occure.

composition.description: Composition token for button large uses @Depreacted font styles
Composition token for button medium @Depreacted font styles
Composition token for button small uses @Depreacted font styles

contentColor.description: Sets the content color for primary "Link Button"
Sets the content color for primary "Link Button"
Sets the content color for primary "Link Button"

Sets the content color for primary "Link Button"

primary.description: Default text color. Used as the main text color for the emails. Provides good and legible contrast for our content.

secondary.description: @hardCoded - Secondary text color. Used for less important text.

footer.description: [Should be merged with secondary text color] Used for the text color in the footer.

link.description: Default link text color. Used for all paragraph level links in emails.

stroke.description: Border color of the container box

default.description: @hardCoded - Color for horizontal lines to split content
